metadata.title: YACHT~ME | Yacht and Boat Rentals - Riviera Sea Life
metadata.description: Discover the luxury of the Adriatic Sea with our exclusive fleet of yachts, sailboats, and premium vessels.

hero.title: The Luxury of the Sea
hero.subtitle: Discover the elegance of sailing with our exclusive fleet of yachts, sailboats, and premium vessels. From Marina di Rimini to infinity.

premiumFleet.description: Luxury vessels maintained in impeccable condition

cta.contactUs: Contact us to book your exclusive experience. Our team is ready to create your perfect voyage.

location.title: Marina di Rimini
location.description: Located in the heart of the Romagna Riviera, our home port offers direct access to the crystal-clear waters of the Adriatic and the most fascinating destinations along the Italian coast.

footer.ctaSubtitle: Book now your luxury sea experience
